cui_name: INFECTIONS, RECURRENT, WITH ENCEPHALOPATHY, HEPATIC DYSFUNCTION, AND CARDIOVASCULAR MALFORMATIONS
reasoning: Extremely rare compound phenotype description suggesting a rare immunodeficiency or metabolic genetic disorder. Multi-system involvement (immune, neurological, hepatic, cardiac) indicates severe genetic condition. No epidemiological data available; only individual case reports. This appears to be a specific disease phenotype rather than a mapped UMLS concept with population incidence data.
